custom-sql.sql: SELECT CT_Campaign.* FROM CT_Campaign INNER JOIN CT_Campaigns_UserSegments ON (CT_Campaigns_UserSegments.campaignId = CT_Campaign.campaignId) AND (CT_Campaigns_UserSegments.userSegmentId IN ([$USER_SEGMENT_IDS$])) WHERE (CT_Campaign.groupId = ?) AND (CT_Campaign.startDate <= ? AND CT_Campaign.endDate >= ?) ORDER BY CT_Campaign.priority ASC
